definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: human (not in Ez P, (H), which use [[פֶּגֶר]]); Jos 8:29 (JE), 1Ki 13:22, 1Ki 13:24, 1Ki 13:24, 1Ki 13:25, 1Ki 13:25, 1Ki 13:28, 1Ki 13:28, 1Ki 13:28, 1Ki 13:29, 1Ki 13:30, 2Ki 9:37, Je 26:23, Je 36:30, De 21:23, De 28:26; coll. corpses Is 5:25, Is 26:19 (wish for restoration to life), Je 7:33, Je 9:21, Je 16:4, Je 19:7, Je 34:20, Ps 79:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of lifeless idols, coll. ´[[נִבְלַת שִׁקּוּחֵיהֶם וגו]] Je 16:18.

: of animals (clean and unclean, wild animals, cattle, birds and reptiles, chiefly Lv Ez), De 14:8; Le 5:2, Le 5:2, Le 5:2, Le 11:8, Le 11:11, Le 11:24, Le 11:25, Le 11:27, Le 11:28, Le 11:35, Le 11:36, Le 11:37, Le 11:38, Le 17:15 (all P); ´[[נ]] specif. = body of animal dying of itself De 14:21; Le 7:24, Le 11:39, Le 11:40, Le 11:40 (P), Le 22:8 (H), Ez Eze 4:14, Eze 44:31.
